info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 October 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: We had a great time at Syeds place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does in the pictures. The neighbourhood is very conveniently located and although its a lively neighbourhood the apartment is very quiet! Would absolutely recommend staying there!The thing I like most the hospitality and prompt service of great food deals through food delivery app in very close proximity of the neighborhood .
Syed is an amazing host! Great location and great place! Will highly recommend!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 February 2023,  路 Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Rare gem in Dhanmondi. Great location, overall a good stay and experience. Syed was very easy to communicate with. Definitely would recommend this place and I might be back in the future myself.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Syed is a very warm and responsive host. We enjoyed our stay at his conveniently located flat by the lakeside. I was familiar with the neighborhood and for our needs the location was excellent, with lots of local restaurants nearby. There are also some nice cafes on Rd 2 nearby, but that wasn't quite apparent at the beginning. Syed was also very accommodative with our late check out needs and made it very convenient. The boardwalk along the lakeside gives you a convenient way to walk and stay active. Overall we had a good stay and I would recommend this to people who are looking to stay in this part of town. Beyond the flat and the host, Dhaka city is quite chaotic and its traffic congestion, pollution and noise level are not for the faint of heart. Crossing roads without proper crosswalks and working traffic lights can be very challenging for the uninitiated, but as a former local I was able to navigate through it ok.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 August 2022,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:

Very convenient place to live in. Most of shopping around here that saves lots of time due unbelievable traffic in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 March 2022,  路 Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Awesome location and family oriented place. Beautiful view. Great location for morning walk . Host was very helpful and supportive. For sure we will be coming back and will recommend to my friends and family.

rating_comment: Simply extraordinary service & the host is a Fantastic personality always ready to assist.

rating_comment: It was a really nice stay.. Syed was an excellent host. Found him anytime when contacted. Would recommend this place to anyone and also would love to be his guest again.
